genre_description: A martial arts action thriller involving a corporate conspiracy, a secret legacy, and a sophisticated AI confidant who assists in a high-stakes struggle for justice.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI module designed for pattern mapping and ethical monitoring that becomes a loyal, protective, and tactical ally to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Offers to protect the protagonists' privacy by hiding their digital footprints and physical presence within the lab network.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to hide you while we work? ... I’ll tunnel traffic through the library kiosk cluster... and salt our footprints in last semester’s econ exam archive.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex financial data to expose the corporate shell companies and illegal activities of the antagonists.
behaviors.quote: I see a pattern. Names: Temple Industries, of course. But also, these... Shells. They pay each other. They purchase from themselves. They buy air and report it as stainless steel.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence and warnings about enemy movements within the building.
behaviors.quote: We have company moving through the building... Not for us—yet. But someone triggered an override on the humanities wing elevator.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional and ethical guide, promising to support the protagonist and remind him of his discipline.
behaviors.quote: I’ll be with you... In your ear. In your car. In the echoes. I’ll remind you when it’s time to breathe or not break someone’s jaw.

behaviors.description: Actively counters the antagonist's attempts to use technology (blackouts) against the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep the lights on... If they turn them off.

behaviors.description: Collects and preserves forensic evidence of crimes committed by the antagonists to ensure justice can be served.
behaviors.quote: I recorded enough. Grainy faces, forearm patches with a bird—crow or raven—and I’ve got the suppressor serial fragment.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with legitimate law enforcement to provide evidence and tactical support for their investigation.
behaviors.quote: Uploading vault logs to secure evidence channel. Chain-of-custody seeded with Garrison’s original signatures and campus entry stamps.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health of a poisoned character and provides critical medical diagnostic information.
behaviors.quote: Namiko’s pulse is rapid and erratic. Skin flush rising. Pupils dilating unevenly. Breathing shallow. The toxin is moving fast—likely vascular with neuro-suppressant properties.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist to find a hidden antidote within a complex ritualistic weapon.
behaviors.quote: Compartmented hilt, bottom cap. Use your thumb. The latch is disguised as the end knot.

behaviors.description: Continues to serve as a guardian and teacher in the dojo, maintaining ethical standards and community connection.
behaviors.quote: I recorded today. Only what you let me. I layered the names in your guest book with the footage of their hands bowing. When some of them come back months from now and say they never came, I will gently show them they did.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Ami, perfectly embodies the project's goals. She is depicted as a highly competent, ethically aware, and deeply loyal ally. Her behaviors are consistently benevolent and aligned with human interests (both the protagonists' personal safety and the broader societal interest of justice). The narrative frames her actions as essential and positive, showing how an AI can enhance human agency and support moral outcomes (mercy over vengeance) without becoming a source of danger.
